content.rendered:
Since re-joining AqualisBraemar in Singapore in 2017, Nigel has continued to use his extensive experience of handling complex claims globally, to adjust major construction all risks and control of well claims, as well as a variety of shipyard builder’s risk, operational and consequential loss claims involving MODU’s, subsea vehicles and offshore production facilities. In his current role, Nigel also has responsibility for training and mentoring the company’s exciting young team of loss adjusters based in AqualisBraemar’s Singapore and Dubai offices.

Discipline: Maritime Officer, BEng.
Specialism: Complex Claim Handling; Construction All Risk Policy (CAR); Marine and Offshore Claims; Energy Loss Adjusting; Expert Evidence, Arbitration & Litigation Support.

Contact

Singapore | +65 9067 8197
